text: Todd McFarlane (born July 5, 1964) is an Canadian American comic-book creator, artist, writer, filmmaker, Toy maker/Builder, entrepreneur and cartoonist. He is best known for his work as the artist on "The Amazing Spider-Man" From 1984 to 1991, Batman: Year Two, Scooby Doo Comics from 1984 to 1988, Donald Duck Comics from 1985 to 1990, Disney Comics, Star Wars Comics from 1986 to 1988, "Godzilla" From 1986 to 1988, Neil Gaiman's The Sandman, Dungeons and Dragons, Magic: The Gathering, Warcraft & Pokemon and as the creator, writer, and artist on the superhero horror-fantasy series "Spawn" & The Mobile Fantasy-RPG Game "Disney Mirrorverse", as well as being the President and co-founder of "Image Comics". Category:Canadian cartoonists Category:Canadian comics artists Category:Comics writers Category:1964 births Category:Living people
title: Todd McFarlane
